titles.title: Home Mortgage Disclosure Adjustment Act
To amend the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975 to specify which depository institutions are subject to the maintenance of records and disclosure requirements of such Act, and for other purposes.
Home Mortgage Disclosure Adjustment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Home Mortgage Disclosure Adjustment Act
This bill amends the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act of 1975 to exempt from maintenance of mortgage loan records and disclosure requirements depository institutions that have originated in each of the two preceding calendar years:
fewer than 100 closed-end mortgage loans, and fewer than 200 open-end lines of credit.
